title: Canine of Interest - Lovable Bear The Dog on Person of Interest
author: CatchWitt
comment:
Shaw : “I hate working with the dog”

In show : “I only do it for the dog”
He just won a huge award. The equivalent of an 'Oscar/Olympic Gold Medal' for most accomplished working dog. There's better info on this online on his web page under his real name.  Congrats Boker!
Three years and only ONE dislike. (probably Greer, because of the time Root used Bear to find him.)
Probably one of my favorites! Who doesn’t love bear?

Finch: He such a dear smart dog
Me: what's that on ur shoulder... xD
description: Our Canine of Interest ~~ Bear. Spend the day on set of Person of Interest with Bear, Michael Emerson, Sarah Shahi and Amy Acker. Includes The Library set before is was destroyed
